reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweatshirt dress chic and comfortable, noting it's not scratchy or itchy, with a great fit and perfect length. They appreciate its versatility, with one customer mentioning it can be dressed up or down, and another noting it's perfect for fall transition wear. The dress receives positive feedback for its quality and medium thickness material, though opinions about the material quality are mixed, with some saying it's good while others note it's not sweatshirt material. Customers disagree on whether it runs true to size. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Dress
items.body: I absolutely love this sweatshirt dress! The Wenrine oversized half-zip is everything I wanted â€” soft, cozy, and super flattering. The material is thick enough to feel high-quality but still lightweight and comfortable. The oversized fit is cute without swallowing you, and the V-neck/half-zip combo gives it a more stylish look than a regular sweatshirt. I wore it for Thanksgiving with boots, and it looked great. I bought the beige color. It is a bit see-through so be aware of that with this color. I did size up one size. It can be dressed up or down. If youâ€™re on the fence, get it â€” youâ€™ll want one in every color! I plan on ordering another one! Read more
items.author: Kate M.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Unique and comfortable
items.body: What an unusual and beautiful dress! Itâ€™s flattering on my curvy figure and very comfy!! Great pockets and material. It can worn around the house or out and about. I got the navy one and may get other colors. I received many compliments when I wore it to Bible study. Read more
items.author: christina thead

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Runs big!
items.body: This is very nice sweatshirt dress but it ran big in size department, I ordered the XL. I plan to reorder it in size medium. Read more
items.author: Judy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute dress!
items.body: So glad I read the reviews and purchased this! Perfect for autumn. White is somewhat transparent, but I knew it would be. I wore it with a long white cami and white bike shorts...problem solved. Looked so cute with my tall brown boots. Super comfortable, too. Read more
items.author: DocJr

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars NOT a sweatshirt!
items.body: This dress is cute, but it is definitely not sweatshirt material. When I tried it on I actually felt hotter than I do in an actual sweatshirt. I agree that it is not scratchy or itchy but it also feels like I need something on under it so I'm not sure if I will keep it. Read more
items.author: WindyGale

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love
items.body: I absolutely love these dresses I bought almost every color except for the white ones cuz they're way too see through these are so nice so comfortable so flattering they wash beautiful I cannot wait to wear these with my wedge tennies or my Uggs in the fall I love them now they just need to get some better colors some hot pink lime green come on get some better colors I love these I'm a size 12 14 I got the extra large it fits great oversized just the way I like it Read more
items.author: Blondee57

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice
items.body: I like it, itâ€™s easy to wear, l like the quality & itâ€™s very comfortable .. Read more
items.author: May

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fit and excellent material for winter.
items.body: Excellent dress for winter. I wear tights with it and sometimes sports shoes. The material is really nice and heavy for the cold weather. Fit is great but a little roomy so next one will be an XL instead of XXL. The length is perfect and comes to my knees I am 5'6". I will buy this in a black. Read more
items.author: Anita L.

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Lake Blue, Navy, Khaki, Pink, Violet, White, Beige, Blue, Dark Khaki, Black, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
